mapper.insert: insert into tb_collection(productId, hcId, userId, isValid, createTime, createUserId, modifyTime, modifyUserId) values(#{productId}, #{hcId}, #{userId}, #{isValid}, GETDATE(), #{createUserId}, GETDATE(), #{modifyUserId});
mapper.update: update tb_collection set productId=#{productId}, hcId=#{hcId}, userId=#{userId}, isValid=#{isValid}, modifyTime=GETDATE(), modifyUserId=#{modifyUserId} where id=#{id}
